lead_paragraph: Ethelbert Smith found himself thinking about the vital role of relative pronouns. It was in connection with a letter which someone recently sent to the State Department accusing the State Department of undue friendship for "highly conservative and reactionary persons who are desirous of retaining the evils of pre-war Europe."
